channel.title: Comments on: T-SQL Tuesday #67 – What Extended Events is Missing
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Jeff
item.dc:creator: Jeff
item.description: When I was at SQLSkills training, I think it was Jon who said the main reason they didn't put the Perfmon part in EE is that they had no idea the feature existed in Profiler! Ha.
item.content:encoded: When I was at SQLSkills training, I think it was Jon who said the main reason they didn’t put the Perfmon part in EE is that they had no idea the feature existed in Profiler! Ha.
